author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Elliott Co, Elliott International, Eica Have Beneficial Ownership Of About 8.8% Of Shares, Combined Economic Exposure In Telecom Italia
text:
April 9 (Reuters) - Telecom Italia SpA:
* CO, ELLIOTT INTERNATIONAL, EICA HAVE BENEFICIAL OWNERSHIP OF ABOUT 8.8% OF SHARES, COMBINED ECONOMIC EXPOSURE IN TELECOM ITALIA AS OF APRIL 3
* SEC FILING * BELIEVES TELECOM ITALIA'S GOVERNANCE, VALUATION, RELATIONSHIPS WITH ITALIAN AUTHORITIES WOULD BE IMPROVED BY REPLACING SOME MEMBERS OF BOARD Source text: ( bit.ly/2JtI2lD ) Further company coverage:
